Reference

Overview

Overview of the package.

caribouMetrics

caribouMetrics: Models and metrics of boreal caribou responses to forest landscapes

Caribou demography

Functions for predicting boreal caribou demographic rates and projecting population growth

caribouBayesianIPM()

Bayesian population model for boreal caribou

caribouPopGrowth()

National caribou demographic model

compositionBiasCorrection()

Calculate bias correction term for calf:cow composition survey.

demographicCoefficients() getCoefs() sampleCoefs()

Sample demographic regression model coefficients

demographicProjectionApp()

Run the Bayesian caribou demographic projection app

demographicRates() sampleRates()

Sample expected survival and recruitment rates

getOutputTables()

Summarize results of Bayesian demographic model in tables

getPriors()

Get prior parameters for Bayesian population model

getScenarioDefaults()

Default parameters for simulation of example demographic trajectories.

getSimsNational()

Get a set of simulation results from the national demographic model

plotRes()

Plot Bayesian population model results

popGrowthTableJohnsonECCC

Population growth model table for Johnson models

runScnSet()

Run the Bayesian population model for multiple parameter sets

simulateObservations()

Simulate observations

Summarizing disturbance

Functions for determining the percentage of a landscape that has been disturbed

DisturbanceMetrics-class DisturbanceMetrics

Disturbance Metrics class

disturbanceMetrics()

Calculate metrics of natural and anthropogenic disturbance

reclassDist()

Reclassify natural disturbance and harvest layers

results()

Extract results

updateDisturbance()

Update an existing DisturbanceMetrics Object

Caribou habitiat

Functions for predicting boreal caribou habitat use in 13 Ontario caribou ranges

CaribouHabitat-class CaribouHabitat

Caribou Habitat class

calcBinaryUse()

Calculate binary use

caribouHabitat()

Calculate relative probability of caribou habitat use

coefTableHR

Model coefficients for caribou ranges

coefTableStd

Model coefficients from standardized data for caribou ranges

fnlcToResType

Lookup table for FNLC to resource type

loadSpatialInputs()

Load Spatial Input Data

plcToResType

Lookup table for PLC to resource type

rasterizeLineDensity()

Rasterize line density

reclassPLC()

Reclassify provincial land cover

resTypeCode

Lookup table for resource type codes

results()

Extract results

rfuToResType

Lookup table for RFU to resource type

threshTable

Binary habitat use thresholds table

updateCaribou()

Update an existing CaribouHabitat Object

plot(<CaribouHabitat>,<ANY>)

Plot method for CaribouHabitat Objects
